entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then light snow beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
